title: Enhancing Language Learning Competencies Through Open Educational Practices

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: A language learning course for office/administrative professionals applying Open Educational Practices (OEP) in a smartphone-based microlearning environment.

learning_goals: Learners can produce language content reflecting peer feedback twice weekly using open digital tools (blogs, wikis).
Learners can analyze cases of understanding and applying open licenses (CC BY-SA) and select appropriate licenses for their learning outputs.
Learners can perform language feedback activities with peers using real-time collaboration tools (e.g., Padlet) on mobile devices with over 80% completion.
Learners can share their language learning outcomes in public online communities (language learning forums) and receive peer evaluations three or more times.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
